page.title: 07My House in Blackmore End
page.content: I live at 5,Lime Avenue,Blackmore End The Avenue has lime trees down each side.It is an unadopted cul-de-sac. There are no litter bins,pavements or letter boxes in our road,but we do have 2 speed-bumps and a lamp-post. The inhabitants of the 24 houses range in age from babies to the elderly.Nearly every family has a car. If you go up the bumpy farm track at the end of the road you will see fields and at the top of the track there is an old farm with horses. My house is about 50 years old.The brick walls are 11 inches thick.It now has 5 bedrooms,several reception rooms,3 bathrooms,2 kitchens and a garage.This includes a self-contained flat for my grandmother.The house has a large back garden with various trees and a climbing frame and swing. Stephanie Lorraine aged 11yrs 7months.
